title: Custom Websites Without the Guesswork
text: Every site I build is fast, mobile-friendly, and tailored to your business goals. Whether you need a simple landing page or a full portfolio, I offer clear pricing and clean design that speaks to your audience.

section.title: Flat Pricing, No Surprises
section.content: Pay a one-time fee for a complete website. No hourly rates or unexpected charges — just transparent pricing that fits your needs.

section.title: Launched and Maintained
section.content: I’ll handle the launch and offer optional hosting and maintenance, so your site stays live, fast, and secure.
